page.title: 07CLUBS IN BRORA 2
page.content: CLUB .AT THAT CLUB THEY PLAY FOOTBALL AND UNI-HOCK AND SOME OTHER THINGS. ON FRIDAYS THERE IS CUBS FOLLOWED BY SCOUTS.BARBARA SUTHERLAND AND DAVIE MACDONALD(BUZBY)AND THE TWO SENIOR SCOUTS.THEY USUALLY PLAY OR DO WORK .AT SCOUTS WE WORK FOR A WHILE THEN WE PLAY FOOTBALL.THE LEADERS ARE DAVIE MACDONALD(BUZBY),JEORDIE BEAK AND THE TWO SENIOR SCOUTS. ON SOME WEATHER PERMITTING SATURDAYS IS THE SEA ANGLING CLUB,AND ALSO EVERY 2ND SATURDAY IS THE SATURDAY CLUB,RUN BY THE CHURCH. ON SUNDAYS THERE ARE NO CLUBS SO IT IS NOT A VERY EXCITING DAY.
